body_html: drpngx was only following Google policy. The policy is designed to protect the interests of the TensorFlow community. It's applied evenly and uniformly to all contributions. So I hope you'll reconsider. I could easily make the change myself. I just feel that since you were able to identify an issue with TensorFlow along with its solution, you deserve to be able to take public credit as the person who solved it.
